trigger.name: snort: barnyard2 not running or wrong count

trigger.expression: {Template App Snort:script.snort.version.nodata(3m)}=1 and ({Template App Snort:script.snort.version.time()}>{$BACKUPTIMEUP} or {Template App Snort:script.snort.version.time()}<{$BACKUPTIMEDOWN})
trigger.name: snort: script.snort.run version nodata 3m
snort: snort not running or wrong count
